snippet: Data will include retail sales and leading economic indicators for September, and companies reporting earnings will include Goldman Sachs, I.B.M., Google, Microsoft, General Electric and McDonald’s.
lead_paragraph: Data will include retail sales and leading economic indicators for September, and companies reporting earnings will include Goldman Sachs, I.B.M., Google, Microsoft, General Electric and McDonald’s.

headline.seo: Economic Reports for the Week of Oct. 15
headline.main: Economic Reports for the Week Ahead
